title: Jax Support Using The Zeke's Harbinger Tweak
body:
So with the introduction of the new Zeke's Harbinger I got thinking about mixing it in with other support items to try to use Jax as a serious support. Obviously he has quite questionable CC with his E being a slightly delayed stun, also he has no shields or heals in his kit prior to building items. With Face of the Mountain, Zeke's Harbinger, Banner of Command and Zhonya's/Banshee's Veil/Warmogs/Rylai's/Rod of Ages/Randuins, Jax could have the FoTM shield, a large boost to health, armor and MR with a very sizable AP boost so he still deals damage, possibly even including some attack speed if his passive isn't cutting it. He also gains amazing utility from Banner of Command and the  arguably support oriented Zeke's Harbinger. So looking aside from Jax's low utility and small amount of cc, and taking in the utilities and extreme bulk due to his scaling defensive ult and items, I wonder if it could work.
Any thoughts or opinions on possible items to use, or any flaws (there are many in this idea) would be appreciated.
